description: Application for non-material amendment to 14F/0986 - (To redevelopment of partly developed site to form 3 buildings (13, 10 and 8 storeys) comprising 578 sq.m. of comercial space (Classes A1, A3 or A4) and 324 residential apartments with ancillary functions, including residents only gym, laundry, reception/meeting areas, plant room, cycle storage, bin stores, landscaped public square, sub-station with vehicle access via Cornhill and Grayson Street and retention of subterranean car park for 360 spaces accessed via Beckwith Street) to provide enhanced entrance facilities to Blocks A and B.
site_address: Land bounded by Wapping, Cornhill and Hurst Street, Liverpool 1
